page_title: Mirka Romppanen – RF Technician and Future ICT Engineer
meta_description: Personal website of Mirka Romppanen – portfolio, RF tools, and frequency table viewer based on Traficom API.
welcome_heading: Welcome to the Frequency Table Service
intro_text: This service provides an interface to the open frequency allocation table from the Finnish Transport and Communications Agency Traficom.
extra_info: You can search for frequency ranges by entering a value and selecting the unit (kHz, MHz, GHz).
table_col1: Frequency band and use in Finland
info_section_text: This service uses open data from the Finnish Transport and Communications Agency Traficom. The official frequency allocation is regulated by the document known as Radio Frequency Regulation 4.
info_construction: Service is under development and may still change. Feedback can be sent to the author.
info_creator: This page was created by Mirka Romppanen, RF technician and ICT engineering student. The service was built for educational and hobby use.
footer_license: Frequency data: Finnish Transport and Communications Agency Traficom, licensed under CC BY 4.0.
